headline: Apple expands services revenue
body: Apple announced a new AI-powered financial planning feature within Apple Card, signaling deeper integration into personal finance ecosystems.

headline: Microsoft wins government cloud deal
body: The Department of Treasury selected Microsoft Azure for a multi-year modernization project, citing strong compliance features.

headline: Global markets wobble amid inflation
body: Persistent inflation fears triggered a midday sell-off in global equities before bargain hunters stepped in near the close.

headline: Auto sector faces supply bottlenecks
body: New supply-chain disruptions in EV battery components weighed on automakers, prompting analysts to trim Q4 projections.
